polymorphic_iarchive_route.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_POLYMORPHIC_IARCHIVE_ROUTE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_POLYMORPHIC_IARCHIVE_ROUTE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // polymorphic_iarchive_route.hpp

00018 
00019 #include <string>
00020 #include <ostream>
00021 #include <cstddef>
00022 
00023 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00024 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00025 namespace std{
00026     using ::size_t;
00027 } // namespace std
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/cstdint.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/archive/polymorphic_iarchive.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00034 
00035 namespace boost {
00036 namespace serialization {
00037     class extended_type_info;
00038 } // namespace serialization
00039 namespace archive {
00040 namespace detail{
00041 
00042 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_iserializer;
00043 class BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) basic_pointer_iserializer;
00044 
00045 template<class ArchiveImplementation>
00046 class polymorphic_iarchive_route :
00047     public polymorphic_iarchive,
00048     // note: gcc dynamic cross cast fails if the the derivation below is
00049     // not public.  I think this is a mistake.
00050     public /*protected*/ ArchiveImplementation,
00051     private boost::noncopyable
00052 {
00053 private:
00054     // these are used by the serialization library.
00055     virtual void load_object(
00056         void *t,
00057         const basic_iserializer & bis
00058     ){
00059         ArchiveImplementation::load_object(t, bis);
00060     }
00061     virtual const basic_pointer_iserializer * load_pointer(
00062         void * & t,
00063         const basic_pointer_iserializer * bpis_ptr,
00064         const basic_pointer_iserializer * (*finder)(
00065             const boost::serialization::extended_type_info & type
00066         )
00067     ){
00068         return ArchiveImplementation::load_pointer(t, bpis_ptr, finder);
00069     }
00070     virtual void set_library_version(unsigned int archive_library_version){
00071         ArchiveImplementation::set_library_version(archive_library_version);
00072     }
00073     virtual unsigned int get_library_version() const{
00074         return ArchiveImplementation::get_library_version();
00075     }
00076     virtual unsigned int get_flags() const {
00077         return ArchiveImplementation::get_flags();
00078     }
00079     virtual void delete_created_pointers(){
00080         ArchiveImplementation::delete_created_pointers();
00081     }
00082     virtual void reset_object_address(
00083         const void * new_address,
00084         const void * old_address
00085     ){
00086         ArchiveImplementation::reset_object_address(new_address, old_address);
00087     }
00088     virtual void load_binary(void * t, std::size_t size){
00089         ArchiveImplementation::load_binary(t, size);
00090     }
00091     // primitive types the only ones permitted by polymorphic archives
00092     virtual void load(bool & t){
00093         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00094     }
00095     virtual void load(char & t){
00096         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00097     }
00098     virtual void load(signed char & t){
00099         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00100     }
00101     virtual void load(unsigned char & t){
00102         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00103     }
00104     #ifndef BOOST_NO_CWCHAR
00105     #ifndef BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00106     virtual void load(wchar_t & t){
00107         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00108     }
00109     #endif
00110     #endif
00111     virtual void load(short & t){
00112         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00113     }
00114     virtual void load(unsigned short & t){
00115         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00116     }
00117     virtual void load(int & t){
00118         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00119     }
00120     virtual void load(unsigned int & t){
00121         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00122     }
00123     virtual void load(long & t){
00124         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00125     }
00126     virtual void load(unsigned long & t){
00127         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00128     }
00129     #if !defined(BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_INT64_T)
00130     virtual void load(boost::int64_t & t){
00131         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00132     }
00133     virtual void load(boost::uint64_t & t){
00134         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00135     }
00136     #endif
00137     virtual void load(float & t){
00138         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00139     }
00140     virtual void load(double & t){
00141         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00142     }
00143     virtual void load(std::string & t){
00144         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00145     }
00146     #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00147     virtual void load(std::wstring & t){
00148         ArchiveImplementation::load(t);
00149     }
00150     #endif
00151     // used for xml and other tagged formats default does nothing
00152     virtual void load_start(const char * name){
00153         ArchiveImplementation::load_start(name);
00154     }
00155     virtual void load_end(const char * name){
00156         ArchiveImplementation::load_end(name);
00157     }
00158 
00159     virtual void register_basic_serializer(const basic_iserializer & bis){
00160         ArchiveImplementation::register_basic_serializer(bis);
00161     }
00162 public:
00163     // this can't be inheriteded because they appear in mulitple
00164     // parents
00165     typedef mpl::bool_<true> is_loading;
00166     typedef mpl::bool_<false> is_saving;
00167     // the >> operator
00168     template<class T>
00169     polymorphic_iarchive & operator>>(T & t){
00170         return polymorphic_iarchive::operator>>(t);
00171     }
00172 
00173     // the & operator
00174     template<class T>
00175     polymorphic_iarchive & operator&(T & t){
00176         return polymorphic_iarchive::operator&(t);
00177     }
00178 
00179     // all current archives take a stream as constructor argument
00180     template <class _Elem, class _Tr>
00181     polymorphic_iarchive_route(
00182         std::basic_istream<_Elem, _Tr> & is,
00183         unsigned int flags = 0
00184     ) :
00185         ArchiveImplementation(is, flags)
00186     {}
00187     virtual ~polymorphic_iarchive_route(){};
00188 };
00189 
00190 } // namespace detail
00191 } // namespace archive
00192 } // namespace boost
00193 
00194 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00195 
00196 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_POLYMORPHIC_IARCHIVE_DISPATCH_HPP
